author: lyazj
body:
#### PR description:

See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47343.

#### PR validation:

The changes are tested using private scripts as well as following the guidelines in the "Before Making Your Pull Request" section at [the webpage](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).

#### Backport information

This is a backport originating from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47343. The backport is proposed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47343#issuecomment-2736559316. The target release is `CMSSW_15_0_X`.
title: [15.0.X] Reduce and unify tagger inputs
